Find Clonotypes Matching Filters

Source: R/which_clonotypes.R
WhichClonotypes.Rd

WhichClonotypes parses through all available clonotypes and returns a subset which match the gene filters applied. Builds off of Seurat::WhichCells

WhichClonotypes(object, filters)

Arguments

object

A Seurat object with clonotype data attached via AddClonotypes
filters

Conditional gene filter statements. Can be passed as a single character statement or as multiple. When passing in multiple gene conditionals, combine as one character string: i.e "CD3E > 0 & CD8A > 0"

Value

WhichClonotypes returns clonotypes that meet the gene filter criteria

See also

WhichCells

Examples

clonotypes <- WhichClonotypes(object = pbmc_vdj, filters = "CD3E > 0")
clonotypes <- WhichClonotypes(object = pbmc_vdj, filters = "CD3E > 0 & CD8A > 0")
